contentfulSermon.title: Acts: Chapters 20-21 - A High Impact Life

fields.notesFormatted:
What It Takes & What To Expect

  1. It's messy.

    Acts 20:1-16, 20:22-23, 21:4, 21:17-40

  2. It pays attention to the little things.

    Acts 20:18

    1 Corinthians 11:1

    Ephesians 5:1-16

  3. It's genuinely humble.

    Acts 20:19

    Matthew 11:29-30

    Philippians 2:3-5

  4. It cares and is fully engaged.

    Acts 20:19-20

    1 Thessalonians 1:5-6

    John 1:14

  5. It's not fazed by rejection.

    Acts 20:19 & 22-23

    John 15:20

  6. It tells the whole truth.

    Acts 20:20 & 26-27

    Ephesians 4:15

  7. It gives more than it gets.

    Acts 20:33-35

    Matthew 20:25-28
